home__description: Motivated arts student seeking to leverage current education to gain professional experience in Design Area..
about__description: Art for me is kind of a way of helping me to tell or speak. I hate writing essays or statements, even now. I am not good at communication. So I would like to use my creativity to show my words, and to tell my thoughts to others. Familiarity and understanding of multiple cultures is my asset. I love to focus on breaking the rules to find new concepts in my design philosophy.
portfolio1__description: Collection of 3D models showcasing my work.
home_3d_description: This is a 3D model depicting a little girl swinging on a playground in autumn. The model captures the joy and innocence of childhood, with the girl enjoying the evening sun and the slide as a backdrop.
portfolio2__description: that uses animation, visual effects, music, and other multimedia elements to tell stories or convey information through dynamic changes on a timeline.
portfolio3__description: showcases various examples of stunning theater lighting designs.
